mapper.select:
SELECT RE.USER_ID, RE.RE_ID, RE.RE_PROFILE, RE.RE_TITLE, RE.RE_INTTI, RE.RE_INTCON, RE.LICENSE, RE.INDATE, UR.USER_NAME, UR.USER_SOCIAL_NUM, UR.USER_PHONE, UR.USER_EMAIL
FROM RESUME RE INNER JOIN USERS UR ON RE.USER_ID = UR.USER_ID
WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{ userId }
ORDER BY RE.RE_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME ( USER_ID, RE_ID, RE_PROFILE, RE_TITLE, RE_INTTI, RE_INTCON, LICENSE ) VALUES ( #{ user_id }, (SELECT NVL(MAX(RE_ID), 0) + 1 FROM RESUME), #{ re_profile }, #{ re_title }, #{ re_intti }, #{ re_intcon }, #{ license } )
INSERT INTO APPLY ( PO_ID, RE_ID, AP_ID ) VALUES ( 1101, #{ re_id }, (SELECT NVL(MAX(AP_ID), 0) + 1 FROM APPLY) )
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUME SET USER_ID = #{ user_id }, RE_ID = #{ re_id }, RE_PROFILE = #{ re_profile }, RE_TITLE = #{ re_title }, RE_INTTI = #{ re_intti }, RE_INTCON = #{ re_intcon }, LICENSE = #{ license } WHERE USER_ID = #{ user_id } AND RE_ID = #{ re_id }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUME WHERE RE_ID = #{ re_id }
